title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - The struggles that boxers fight
itunes:title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - The struggles that boxers fight
description:
Chris is joined by Sergio Mora to talk about the struggles that boxers face on a regular basis, they dive into what's next for Danny Garcia and the one boxer that they both think he should fight, and finally why Jake Paul's fight got canceled. Later, Chris talks with Vergil Ortiz to discuss his upcoming fight with Michael McKinson. #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
